__e: When Jonah and I are together... we just kinda fit. And I haven't really felt that with anyone else.
Well, it was awkward at first, but Jonah and Margaret have been working very hard to be... well, to be a family again, to ease Harry back into your life.
It's a bad world, Jonah. And inconvenient as it may be for you and me, when bad things happen, they don't just happen one at a time.
